title: The Jeffersonian Detroit
posting_body: Rising 30 stories above Detroit's historic Jefferson Avenue, The Jeffersonian delivers high-quality hospitality, a relaxing waterfront location, and breathtaking views of the city skyline and sparkling Detroit River.
The Downtown Detroit apartments sit just minutes from downtown, the Villages of Detroit, and possess lavish, mid-century architecture and undeniable urban charm.
From your own private balcony, indulge in the majestic beauty of the Detroit River, Belle Isle, and Downtown Detroit.
Enjoy a scenic bike ride along the River Walk or simply marvel in the lush greenery of our six acres of waterfront landscaping.
